attributes.action: Stop the banks introducing charges for current accounts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop the high street banks introducing charges for current account holders,they already make vast profits e.g. Barclays posted profits today of circa £7.9 Billion.After all its our money anyway.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
